website_summaries.verdict: May appeal to consumers who like its unique looks, but others offer similar qualities and safety ratings if you don't like its old-fashioned style.
pros: Cute vintage look w/superior safety ratings and pine wood craftsmanship
cons: Some reports of splinters and cracks developing in the wood over time
Doesn't come with toddler bed conversion kit

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe product..
customer_reviews.text: I loved this crib, but after a year, the sides split. My daughter is not rambunctious at all. She barely stands up in it. We moved the crib once and the tall end split down the middle.... it only lasted about a year. It's really disappointing and super scary!
customer_reviews.author: MindyLauren

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: So changing my review.. this crib is great for a new born.. but now that my baby is 1 and weighs about 25pounds I’ve found that it was made very cheaply as the side rales wobble/ bend, and one actually cracked while trying to place her in her crib.. I’m supper disappointed as I love the look of this crib. But I can’t say that this crib is safe.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this crib!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crib because our toddler was outgrowing her mini crib at about 1 y/o so we decided transition her to a standard sized crib that could convert to a toddler bed. I had my doubts about this crib because of some of the comments here but decided to give it a try since I love its classic design and the affordable price point. I am so glad I went for it. We have had this crib for about 6 months it’s held up. The assembly wasn’t easy but also not as terrible as some have described in other comments. For reference our toddler is now 18 months about 32 in long and 25 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib! I also loved the price, snatched this one up when it dropped below 200.00! I read where previous buyers were having trouble with the paint chipping from teething babies so I added rail covers to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with three style of this crib, it has loads of vintage charm and isn't as clunky as a lot of designs (that don't cost an arm and a leg). I assembled this myself at 7 mo pregnant and it was pretty straight forward and easy. It's a solid study piece; all wood no composite. Plus, unlike a lot of other cribs and some of the other colors offered, this crib in green came with the toddler rail included! It also fits the tropical/ jungle theme of our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Songofthemushibird

customer_reviews.title: Good crib for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tested the crib with a baby yet, but this is my assessment thus far. I received all the correct pieces, so no problems with that. None of the pieces arrived damaged, nor did I notice any paint chipping. The crib was easy to assemble, I believe there are 12 bolts (plus washers) with optional wheels. It took me and my wife around 30 minutes total to unpack and fully assemble. The crib seems sturdy when assembled. I do advise you to be careful when fully tightening the bolts because you might risk cracking the wood.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Timeless. Absolutely PERFECT two years later.
customer_reviews.text: It's classic and traditional and oh-so-elegant and timeless. Everyone loves my nursery. I put both cribs together myself while pregnant. Super easy. I contemplated a designer crib from pottery barn and restoration hardware. I love this 10x more. I removed any/all stickers using a hair drying to heat up the sticker and then easily peeled them off.
customer_reviews.author: Roseofmyday

customer_reviews.title: Vintage feel, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. It has a vintage feel. I had the same crib as a child. We put this in my son's elephant themed room. It was easy to put together and easy to adjust. There have been some recalls on this crib due to the brackets braking, but ours did not seem to be part of that recall. We were able to verify this with the company. Our brackets are metal and seem very secure. We have had no problems. You can purchase a conversion kit for this separately to change into a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: The Manuels

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, vintage looking crib with an outstanding teal color. I have had zero problems with the mattress frame moving....not sure how it could once you have it screwed in tight on all for sides. Assemble this crib in the room you want it in. In many cases it's just barely too wide to squeeze through put together without roughing up the paint. Overall I'm very happy with this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib for my baby girl’s room and I’m very happy with it. It was easy to assemble and it came in good condition with no parts missing. The crib is exactly as pictured, is nice, sturdy, safe and very reasonably priced. It would also work very well for a boys room. If you are considering this crib I recommend that you go online and check other nurseries were parents or interior designers have used this model. I have seen it in many nurseries, modern ones or vintage, and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this crib so far, seeing how my son hasn’t arrived yet, I can’t speak much on the durability aspect of it but the product itself came just as promised. It was easy to assemble, arrived early, and looks just like it did in the photo from the seller. I was a little worried the color might be a little off seeing how it is the emerald green, but the color is exactly as depicted. I love how light weight and easy it is to roll around, yet it sits very securely in place once you enable the wheel locks.
customer_reviews.author: marmar

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this crib for 1.5 years now and I still love it. Super easy to assemble, goes well with my decor and very steady. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeru

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this crib 7 years ago when my first was born. Since then, it’s been used by my other two children as well. To say I love this crib is an understatement. All three of my babies slept soundly and safely in it. It looked beautiful in each of their rooms (2 boys and a girl). It’s beautiful, sturdy, and truly stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: SHopkins

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has not arrived yet but the crib was so easy to assemble, the color is very beautiful (we got Lagoon) and the frame is very sturdy. It’s not big and bulky. It also came with the toddler conversion. We are pleased so far. Can’t wait for baby to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: wood feels like balsa wood
customer_reviews.text: Had the crib for a year now. My boy just turned two and he is small for his age. When he acts up I give him a four-minute time-out in his crib. The wood is very light-weight and he can now kick out the spokes at will. I'm looking on Craig's list today to see if I can find a crib that has a heavier weight wood
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Happy mommy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small crib for my very small apt. Not only this is a very beautiful crib it is easy to install. It outsell in nyc stores ( as other parents also live in small places ) and I was a little skeptical in buying it online, but I had no issues with my package. I'm very happy and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to move this crib. I can roll it in my room if baby is sick and keep an eye. Classic and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib. We took off the wheels. The white matched our coral, dark blue, aqua theme perfectly. There have since been two safety recalls, which we have ignored mainly because we've had no noticeable safety issues with the bed. I'm fairly certain there's a kit you guy to convert to a toddler bed. We got a great price (on sale) and then Amazon honored the difference when it went down even more (down to $150 from $199) within 7 days of our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking crib
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has only slept in her crib periodically so far (she is only 3 months old). The packaging was done well, no dings or scrapes. My husband and I were able to quite easily an quickly put the crib together. It is an adorable crib, it looks much more expensive than it is. The things I don't care for, the tacky colored caster wheels which are a very brassy gold color. I also wish there were small plugs to cover up the screws. It is a small distraction, it just would have made it a notch better to not see the ends of the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Hojsacks

customer_reviews.title: I simply love it. When shopping for a crib
customer_reviews.text: We have had this crib for a year and a half. I simply love it. When shopping for a crib, I was looking for something not so bulky, and it was very hard to find something that i liked so much. After so many months, I still love it, it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ani K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib took a week to arrive which was annoying but once it got here I was very pleased! I ended up putting it together myself, took less than 20 minutes! Very cute crib, seems to be good quality, and I love the size of it. Only issue was the paint was chipped in one area, but with a little white touch up paint it looks perfect! I definitely would recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: ggs1990

customer_reviews.title: Let me count the ways...
customer_reviews.text: Oh how we love this crib! -It was easy to put together. It took my husband and I (together, the extra set of hands helps) about 10-15 minutes -It's beautiful in person. The bolts do stand out a bit because they are silver. We just dabbed a bit of paint on them -It fits great in small spaces -It's sturdy! -Vintage look for a fraction of the price. I can't recommend this crib enough. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Bars wide enough to get a leg stuck
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter keeps getting a leg stuck between the bars. Had to buy a breathable bumper pad to prevent this. Other than that I like the crib quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Airbnb called The Perrault House. I like the fact that it has rolling wheels that allow parents to easily move the baby bed next to their bed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Denise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Someone had donated this crib to me and after doing research I realize her crib could of been part of the recalled batch from 2012. Even though she used the older crib for her children, I couldn't see myself using a potential recall. ( the sticker wasn't on the crib anymore) I love the clean, crisp look I decided to purchase it, it is affordable, beautiful, sturdy and worth what you pay for. I know many fear from the recall, but I see the difference in the construction of the newer ones from the older ones. They upgraded that's for sure. I love this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It is much prettier than picture and makes a beautiful nursery for a boy or girl
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous crib!!! It is much prettier than picture and makes a beautiful nursery for a boy or girl. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib
customer_reviews.text: This crib was the exact look I was going for in my twin's nursery. They were excellently priced! They were easy to put together and you don't have to use the wheels, which is a plus. The only thing I don't like about it is having to retrieve pacis from behind them because of the slats in the back. Still 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CRIB. Fits Colgate Eco-Classica mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the white, but the cherry was the only one that would ship free to me, and I'm so glad it was because I absolutely love it. It's petite, very sturdy and looks really good in a nursery. Adds a vintage feel. I didn't add the wheels, and it's very sturdy. Also love the fact that it's solid wood and baby safe and friendly. Not a very strong paint smell. And so reasonably priced... the colgate classica mattresses are a very snug and perfect fit (I like snug so there's no gaps for accidents.)
customer_reviews.author: rr521

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend’s baby shower and she cried she was so happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Roof

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crib that is sold for a great price here on amazon. This was quite easy to assemble and it is very sturdy and good looking. I like that it would go well in any type of room with different decorations or bedding. It is very versatile. I have seen it displayed in very expensive baby stores with fine linens, and it looks like one of the thousand dollar cribs! The color is a true white, and the matching changing table looks great with it as well. I would recommend this crib to my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crib about a year ago and love it! I love how cute and sturdy it is. My husband put it together and said it wasn't too difficult. He also likes the sturdiness of it. We both appreciate how our daughter fits in it. She is tall and big for her age but we don't think she'll be able to climb out for quite some time (she's 18 months now). We would definitely recommend it! Again, I just think it is so cute and sweet. The wheels are handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best crib for the money
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how large cribs were these days, they ginormous! I'm not a very tall person & at the baby store I could barely reach into some of them. I very pleased with the scale of this crib, it has a light, airy presence & I think it's pretty stylish too. Much cheaper than the iron crib I found online & the design is similar. Style wise it really goes with anything! Nice quality wood, looks durable, but it's not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu B

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is amazing! I am always skeptical about purchasing furniture online, but this was a great purchase. It took about 45 minutes to put together with the help of my wife and was super easy. The paint on the crib was flawless since it was packaged so well. The construction feels very sturdy and I feel it is worth much more than I paid for it. It also came with the convertible rail! For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua brown

customer_reviews.title: it was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Even though our baby has not slept in this crib, it was very easy to put together, it came to us perfect, no flaws, nothing missing. I love the classic look of the crib in her room. Lets hope she sleeps in it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look without the vintage price
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this crib. It has a very vintage look without the vintage price. The ONLY thing I am disappointed is the hardware for the mattress support. It is black and everything else is white so it does stick out even when you put the nursery bedding on. It definitely should be white. All in all I love it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: we absolutely love this crib
customer_reviews.text: So far, we absolutely love this crib. It's super easy to assemble and disassemble. It feels very sturdy and secure. Lastly, it's absolutely beautiful! The color of the wood and the shape of the bars are exactly what I wanted. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib!
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib in our nursery. We have a small nursery (10'x10') and it's small profile fits perfectly without taking up too much space. It's really a lovely design. We chose not to attach the included wheels, as we won't be moving the crib around and feel the wheels take away from the beauty of the crib. The crib was very easy to assemble, it took only about 15-20 minutes for my husband and I to put it together. We are very happy with this crib!
customer_reviews.author: mistydawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib. It was super easy to assemble, took 10 minutes at 8 months pregnant. None of the pieces are super heavy either. I left the wheels off and it looks so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Mishelly

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping and high quality
customer_reviews.text: These beds are very high quality and sturdy. The shipping was super fast (with Sunday delivery) Couldn't be more pleased to have such wonderful cribs for the future grand-twins!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful crib and the third for us from them.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually our third Jenny Lind crib. We've now bought one for each of our girls, all in different colors. They're extremely easy to put together, light, but durable. The first crib is now a toddler bed and is on it's fourth move. Having been disassembled and put back together. Our hope is that we can pass them to our daughters for their future use.
customer_reviews.author: Jdb200

customer_reviews.title: The perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Love the Lagoon color. The color pops off great in front of the deep gray wall. Easy to put together, sturdy, and has wheels for easy movement across carpet. It's exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Wheels squeaky
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has been sleeping on this crib for two weeks, it’s a nice crib. We like it. The only problem is the wheels are squeaky whenever we move it. Any solution for that issue? It makes really loud sound. Otherwise I would give a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Lannaya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: Product was highly satisfactory and works as desired. I found it to be slightly overpriced but it has all of the qualities that I wanted. It is easy to assemble and is perfect for any temporary living situation or in areas where space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this only a different color with my first daughter 21 years ago...bought this one for my new miracle baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib for my baby girl
customer_reviews.text: Classic, elegant, dainty. I love this crib for my baby girl! Her room is very girly and this fits perfectly. I think it could definitely be used for a boy too. I just love the details. We took the wheels off because I didn't like the look of them. Very cute crib!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib, Great Style
customer_reviews.text: I was totally stumped about what syle crib to buy until I saw this one. I knew this was exactly what I wanted and didn't hesitate to purchase. Our daughter is ten months old now and the crib has been great. Now that she is standing up we've lowered the mattress level down one notch. There is still one more level to lower in case she becomes and escape artist. Will probably buy the side rail when she is ready.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I have one I bought 5 years ago so got s second but this one has a strong chemical smell fills the room. Not sure why but it’s awful
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Sturdy Crib
customer_reviews.text: I love the classic style of this Jenny Lind crib. My husband was able to put it together in about 20 minutes... we didn't need any extra tools and it was pretty self explanatory. We opted for the "Lagoon" color for something a bit more unique. It is definitely darker and closer to turquoise than the photos show here. Luckily, I happen to like that! The crib seems to be very good quality and it is obviously made of real wood. It is incredibly sturdy when put together. As other reviewers suggested, we left off the casters for now as we don't need to be rolling the crib anywhere. Very pleased with this purchase. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small nursery!! Finish and color are perfect too!! Great with white and muted pink accents!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Desi C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this crib. It’s sturdy and looks amazing! Easy to put together when very pregnant, too. I did it while my hubby was out of town, I’m very impatient lol.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib! So easy to assemble and very chic. I also love that it has wheels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crib because I was in love with the design. However, after reading mixed reviews about the crib arriving with cracked parts I still went ahead and purchased it. I should have not wasted my time the wood was very cheap and the rails were cracked. I love the design but the quality was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Abrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib is timelessly classy with a modern color twist
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib in the perfect color for my newest daughter's room. We all love it. She sleeps peacefully every night in this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdier than it looks, and will work perfectly in our nursery. Yes, there are a rather obnoxious number of sticker to be removed. Yes, the gold tone on the rollers is a bit of an eyesore. But, in this price range, I am perfectly willing to handle both of those rather small irritations.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and easy to assemble. I was able to assemble it all by myself (though it would've been even easier with two people). Turned out to be very sturdy/stable too. I ditched the casters and just put some felt pads under the legs/feet.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color. Quick assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This crib is a lovely shade of grey. Could be for either s baby boy or girl. Went together quickly. Seems to be sturdy & yet mobile w/wheels. Purchased for our son & daughter in law. Baby due in December.
customer_reviews.author: BargainBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful crib! Easy to set up and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful crib! Easy to set up and sturdy. The lagoon is more of a teal which was more of what we wanted anyway. Ours came with the toddler rail conversion kit. We would defiantly recommend this crib! Great classic reliable crib and doesn't cost an arm and a leg!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loud41

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a new Grandson. He is sleeping in it tonight. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RedDirt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older DaVinci crib. Continued quality. Exactly as I expected. Not one flaw. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the Jenny Lind vintage style and probably would have paid double what i did for it. awesome value, especially because I think this crib looks better than the over priced popular store brands and it converts into a toddler bed and a daybed. If you are thinking of getting a crib, this is the one. Plus, super quick and simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib
customer_reviews.text: Bought in white and love everything about it. I was a little sceptial about buying it online but it was a great choice! I recommend to anyone looking for classic looking crib.
customer_reviews.author: The Hollands

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this crib! Extremely easy to put together and also very sturdy once built. We purchased the ebony color for our son- has the perfect balance between masculine, trendy and with a classic look! I recommend this to anyone who can't seem to bring themselves to spend $500+ for a crib but still want a great quality product. Need I mention I ordered it through Amazon and it was on my doorstep in a few days :)
customer_reviews.author: blythe thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this crib. Not only is it sustainable but it looks great. Very easy to assemble and convert. Great crib on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Fairydazy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We just set it up yesterday, and it looks so nice! I am going for that Restoration Hardware look on a budget, and it totally works. As for functionality...not sure so far. Baby won't be here until December. I am expecting it to be fine though. Seems very sturdy. I did not attach the wheels - they are hideous.
customer_reviews.author: Aml1618

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Makes a perfect look in a smaller room. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: Alive in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to put together. Sturdy. Pretty. All the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gallaway

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, great style and great color! This comes with the toddler conversion kit, unlike many other cribs on the market, so it's a very good value!
customer_reviews.author: emn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little crib that looks great and didn't take long to set up. I also like that DaVinci makes non-toxic cribs. Our past crib had a bad smell, and I've read reviews of other cribs for sale on Amazon that off-gas for a while. Buying this crib was a no-brainer and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality! Came broken in half. looks like PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: horrible quality - VERY cheaply made. Looks like plastic, not wood. When i got it one of the spindles was broken completely in half. Returned it and did not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great looking crib
customer_reviews.text: Great looking crib. Looks more expensive than it is. The wood is a little soft so be careful that you don't scrape it when putting it together and I would definitely get bite rails.
customer_reviews.author: Auntris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend this crib. It's sturdy and gorgeous. It's easy to assemble and very practical. It's also light and well built. But mostly my satisfaction with the product comes from the fact that it was incredibly easy to purchase it online, it was delivered on time within two days, in perfect condition. I was so happy with Amazon's service. Plus the price: the item is cheaper than in the stores and easier delivery. On top of all that, the crib matches perfectlyy daughter's nursery. Perfect combination of factors. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Brookey

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t love it more!
customer_reviews.text: I waited months for the Blush Pink version to be back in stock. It was worth it! I’m so glad I waited and didn’t settle on something. The paint is more of a matte finish and so pretty. It was so easy to put together. My 8 year old and I finished it in 15 minutes. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin McFeely

customer_reviews.title: "pretty crib"
customer_reviews.text: It was not for me, it was a gift for my niece's baby. All I know is that she loved it and appreciate it very much.
customer_reviews.author: cora

customer_reviews.title: but the giftees seem to love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, so don't know first-hand, but the giftees seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: vrickg

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib! We made a simple crib skirt to go with it and it looks great. The best part is that you can turn it around and position it differently in your room if you have a weird space like we do. Some cribs clearly have a front & back but this one looks the same all around.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy crib, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This crib was a breeze to put together. I would give the overall review 5 stars if the warning stickers were easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Holly W.

customer_reviews.title: Jenny Lind Crib review
customer_reviews.text: I love my jenny lind crib!!!!!....Just what i wanted, when my first daughter was born i bought one for her, now 4 daughters later and two granddaughters, my jenny lind crib is just what i wanted for my home. So when my granddaughters come to visit, and one granddaughter will be at my house everyday while her parents work. The crib is beautiful and very vintage/antique looking, i bought a real cute shabby chic bedding set for it and it turned out just perfect. I bought my crib through amazon and have purchased many other items through amazon and have been very impressed with quality and how quick my products have arrived. Very satisfied grandma in wyoming!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vintage feel.
customer_reviews.text: This crib was easy to put together. A second set of hands helps. The only thing I would like to see change is an addition of the little wood plugs to hide the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: CamiMarbles

customer_reviews.title: Best Crib Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this crib more than I already do. It's beautiful! It's sturdy and very well made, easy to put together and oh so pleasing to the eye. I love the affordability and the fact that it converts to a toddler bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the nursury!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib. Soo cute. We removed the (ugly) wheels and are glad we did. One tip- I spent over 2 hours peeling off all the warning stickers (even ordered adhesive remover). It was a pain in the neck. Wish I would have only removed the stickers on the part facing outward rather than being OCD and removing ALL of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ackermann

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the Jenny Lind cribs and got this one at a great price compared to what I could buy locally. It's very sturdy and has held up well. There is a little bit of scraping on the top rail from teething and hanging things on it, but I would expect that from any crib. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, and I like the way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Granger

customer_reviews.title: Great price and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the style of this crib! It arrived on-time and was very easy to put to together. Great price and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Conant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Navy Crib at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This crib was recommended by a friend, and super easy to put together. The navy color was the perfect addition for our nautical nursery theme. We purchased the one with the toddler conversion. Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib. It was easy to put together and is so cute in our daughter’s nursery.
customer_reviews.author: John Upole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib! Especially since I am Amazon Prime and don't have to pay for shipping. My daughter is almost to the stage of using as a toddler. The crib is still in perfect condition! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great looking crib at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around a lot for our first crib purchase and are very happy with the Jenny Lind. All of the cribs that initially drew our eye were trendy $700+ Swedish baby beds that were just never an option for us. We are really pleased with the simple design and solid construction of the Jenny Lind. It definitely looks a lot nicer than its price tag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: love this crib
customer_reviews.text: love this crib! two years later, it is still sturdy and no chipping. the casters roll easily, however they are a "cheapy-looking" gold tone rather than bright if that matters to you. easy to adjust the height as your baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: DaVinci Jenny Lind Crib
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of positives about this crib: it's light weight // it's very easy to assembly // it looks amazing. At this point, we haven't actually started using the crib...but everything up to this point has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K Shatswell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib! Love that it is a smaller size ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib! Love that it is a smaller size crib, not bulky, fit into a small area...love that it looks vintage but new! All parts were received and ship/packaged in perfect condition! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amber miller

customer_reviews.title: we like it.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. Not too difficult to assemble. Some of the screw holes are exposed and compromise the esthetic, other than that, we like it.
customer_reviews.author: dentistbyday

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boy/girl twins nursery and I love the look of them. They are not quite as sturdy/strong as the expensive crib we had for my first son, but they are a great value and look beautiful in their room!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. I like the vintage style and it is easy to assemble. My son sleeps well in there. It is easy to move mattress down and they grow and climb.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zoldos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, timeless and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect crib! So beautiful and makes the perfect addition to the nursery. My husband was able to assemble the whole thing in about 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Abby WelchTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I love the crib However the pieces are very fragile. I didnt notice after throwing the box away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first child I spent way too much on a crib although it is beautiful. I needed another crib for my second as my first was still happy in his crib. I have had the crib 7 months now and it has been great. I don't remember it taking too long to put together. Seems sturdy and I think looks great for the price. We do not have wheels on ours. Will probably use as a toddler bed for my first child when he start climbing out.
customer_reviews.author: TYC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for our first grandchild. Easy to put together and well made. Jenny Lind will always be around.
customer_reviews.author: Gary & Kellie Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib we bought for our 3rd baby
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib we bought for our 3rd baby. Sturdier than the drop side Jenny Lind crib we had for my first two. My 6 week old hasn't slept in it yet, but he likes laying in it for a few min.
customer_reviews.author: G P B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something vintagey but less likely to kill the kid than an actual vintage crib. I hate the giant $400 sleigh-style monstrosities that appear to be the rage these days. This looked good! Not any particle board crap either, nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessiface

customer_reviews.title: This crib is classic and beautiful, and the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: This crib is classic and beautiful, and the quality is great! We love it and it works perfectly in my daughter's nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: DaVinci Jenny Lind 3-in-1 Convertible Crib in White - 4 Adjustable Mattress Positions, Greenguard Gold
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteDaVinci’s beloved Jenny Lind 3-in-1 Convertible Crib brings classic, vintage-inspired charm to the nursery. Signature heirloom style and solid wood spindle posts are paired with easy assembly and convertibility for use beyond the nursery years. Crib converts to toddler bed and daybed, with wheels included for mobility. Match with the Jenny Lind Changing Table to complete the collection.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Jenny Lind collection is just right for baby. As an MDB original, the Jenny Lind has been reengineered for safety and convenience. That's twenty years in the making. Jenny is just right
feature_bullets: Four adjustable mattress positions that can be lowered as your baby begins to sit and stand | Easily converts to toddler bed and daybed (toddler conversion kit #M3199 sold separately)

Crib dimensions – 54.6” L x 30.4” W x 41.1” H | Interior dimensions – 52.125” L x 27.75” W | Slat strength – 135 lbs. | Front-rail measurement – 30.375” H | Weight limit – When child begins to climb or reaches 35 inches (Toddler bed – 50 lbs.)
This product has been tested for over 10,000 chemicals! It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play and grow
Rolling wheels allow you to move the crib around freely and to move aside to clean those hard to reach areas under the crib. Wheels can be locked to keep crib stationary

Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pine wood | Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe. Rest assured knowing it exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards

specifications.Material Type: New Zealand Pine Wood and TSCA compliant MDF
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars644 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
